metadata.Title: SoilTemperature
metadata.Extended description: The soil temperature model simulates heat flux and temperatures over the soil profile (including the soil surface). Processes are based on Campbell (1985) and include computation of volumetric heat capacity, thermal conductivity, boundary layer conductance, net radiation and numerical solution of heat flow using the Thomas algorithm.
metadata.Short description: Simulates diurnal and seasonal soil temperature profile and related thermal properties.

process.name: doProcess
process.description: Perform actions for current day: simulate diurnal soil temperature including net radiation, thermal properties and heat flow using an internal time-stepping loop.
process.firstLine: const int interactionsPerDay = 48;     // number of iterations in a day

inputs.name: weather_MeanT
inputs.description: Mean daily air temperature from weather (used for initialization and interpolation)

inputs.name: weather_Tav
inputs.description: Average daily air temperature (Tav) used for initial soil temperature and baseline

inputs.name: weather_MaxT
inputs.description: Daily maximum air temperature (used in diurnal interpolation)

inputs.name: weather_MinT
inputs.description: Daily minimum air temperature (used in diurnal interpolation and radiation calculations)

inputs.name: weather_Amp
inputs.description: Temperature amplitude used for seasonal temperature profile (used in calcSoilTemperature)

inputs.name: weather_Radn
inputs.description: Daily measured solar radiation (used for net radiation calculations)

inputs.name: weather_Wind
inputs.description: Wind speed (used in boundary layer conductance calculation)

inputs.name: weather_AirPressure
inputs.description: Air pressure (used to calculate air density)

inputs.name: weather_Latitude
inputs.description: Site latitude (degrees) used in solar geometry and seasonal temperature

inputs.name: clock_Today_DayOfYear
inputs.description: Day of year (clock.Today.DayOfYear) used for seasonal calculations

inputs.name: microClimate_CanopyHeight
inputs.description: Canopy height (used to compute canopy/roughness for boundary layer conductance)

inputs.name: physical_Thickness
inputs.description: Thickness of soil layers (mm) (source: Physical component)

inputs.name: physical_BD
inputs.description: Soil bulk density for each layer (g/cm3) (source: Physical component)

inputs.name: organic_Carbon
inputs.description: Carbon (organic matter) fraction for each layer (%) (source: Organic component)

inputs.name: physical_Rocks
inputs.description: Volumetric fraction of rocks in each layer (%) (source: Physical component)

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSand
inputs.description: Sand fraction (%) by layer (source: Physical component)

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSilt
inputs.description: Silt fraction (%) by layer (source: Physical component)

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeClay
inputs.description: Clay fraction (%) by layer (source: Physical component)

inputs.name: waterBalance_SW
inputs.description: Soil water content per layer (source: SoilWater component) used to compute node water and thermal properties

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eos
inputs.description: Eos (used to compute penetration constant / radiation partitioning)

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eo
inputs.description: Eo (reference evaporation) used in radiation/penetration constant

inputs.name: waterBalance_Salb
inputs.description: Soil albedo (fraction) used in surface temperature calculation

inputs.name: waterBalance_Es
inputs.description: Actual/remaining evaporation used to compute latent heat flux

inputs.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
inputs.description: Depth down to constant temperature (mm) (model property)

inputs.name: InitialValues
inputs.description: Initial temperatures for each soil layer (oC) (model input / initial condition)

inputs.name: instrumHeight
inputs.description: Instrument height above ground (m) (optional input; if <=0 default used)

inputs.name: defaultInstrumentHeight
inputs.description: Default instrument height used when instrumHeight not provided (m)

inputs.name: timestep
inputs.description: Internal time-step (seconds) used by model (private field)

inputs.name: nu
inputs.description: Forward/backward differencing coefficient (0-1) used in numerical scheme (default 0.6)

inputs.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
inputs.description: Flag to choose boundary layer conductance source: 'calc' or 'constant' (default 'calc')

inputs.name: netRadiationSource
inputs.description: Flag to choose net radiation source: 'calc' or 'eos' (default 'calc')

inputs.name: latentHeatOfVapourisation
inputs.description: Latent heat of vaporisation for water (J/kg) constant

inputs.name: stefanBoltzmannConstant
inputs.description: Stefan-Boltzmann constant (W/m2/K4)

inputs.name: bareSoilRoughness
inputs.description: Roughness element height of bare soil (mm)

inputs.name: pom
inputs.description: Particle density of organic matter (Mg/m3) used in volumetric fraction calculations

inputs.name: ps
inputs.description: Particle density of soil fines (Mg/m3) used in volumetric fraction calculations

inputs.name: soilWater
inputs.description: Internal per-layer soil water content array used in thermal calculations (derived from waterBalance.SW)

inputs.name: bulkDensity
inputs.description: Internal bulk density per layer (g/cm3) (derived from physical.BD)

inputs.name: thickness
inputs.description: Internal thickness array including phantom layers (mm)

inputs.name: nodeDepth
inputs.description: Depths of nodes (m) (internal mapped from thickness)

inputs.name: numNodes
inputs.description: Number of nodes over the soil profile (internal structural variable)

inputs.name: numLayers
inputs.description: Number of soil layers (internal structural variable)

inputs.name: volSpecHeatSoil
inputs.description: Volumetric specific heat at nodes (J/K/m3) used by numerical solver

inputs.name: thermalConductivity
inputs.description: Thermal conductivity over the soil profile (W.m/K) (node array)

inputs.name: soilTemp
inputs.description: Temperature of each soil node/layer (oC) (state updated by solver)

inputs.name: newTemperature
inputs.description: Temporary array holding new temperatures during time-step iterations (oC)

inputs.name: morningSoilTemp
inputs.description: Soil temperature profile saved at morning (oC)

inputs.name: minSoilTemp
inputs.description: Per-node minimum soil temperature recorded during the day (oC)

inputs.name: maxSoilTemp
inputs.description: Per-node maximum soil temperature recorded during the day (oC)

inputs.name: aveSoilTemp
inputs.description: Per-node average soil temperature over the day (oC)

inputs.name: boundaryLayerConductance
inputs.description: Average atmosphere boundary layer conductance (W/K) over the day

inputs.name: netRadiation
inputs.description: Net radiation per internal time-step (MJ) used in heat flux boundary condition

inputs.name: airTemperature
inputs.description: Air temperature at current internal timestep (oC)

outputs.name: FinalSoilTemperature
outputs.description: Temperatures over the soil profile at end of a day (at midnight)

outputs.name: FinalSoilSurfaceTemperature
outputs.description: Temperature of soil surface at end of a day (midnight)

outputs.name: Value
outputs.description: Average soil temperature over a day (alias of AverageSoilTemperature)

outputs.name: AverageSoilTemperature
outputs.description: Temperatures over soil profile averaged over a day

outputs.name: AverageSoilSurfaceTemperature
outputs.description: Soil surface temperature averaged over a day

outputs.name: MinimumSoilTemperature
outputs.description: Minimum temperatures over the soil profile within a day

outputs.name: MinimumSoilSurfaceTemperature
outputs.description: Minimum soil surface temperature within a day

outputs.name: MaximumSoilTemperature
outputs.description: Maximum temperatures over the soil profile within a day

outputs.name: MaximumSoilSurfaceTemperature
outputs.description: Maximum soil surface temperature within a day

outputs.name: BoundaryLayerConductance
outputs.description: Atmosphere boundary layer conductance averaged over a day

outputs.name: ThermalConductivity
outputs.description: Thermal conductivity over the soil profile (node array)

outputs.name: HeatCapacity
outputs.description: Volumetric heat capacity over the soil profile (J/K/m3)

outputs.name: HeatStore
outputs.description: Heat storage over the soil profile (J/K)

outputs.name: Thr_profile
outputs.description: Internal morning temperature profile (copy of morningSoilTemp)

functions.name: doNetRadiation
functions.description: Calculate initial variables for net radiation per time-step (populate solarRadn, cloudFr, cva).

functions.name: Zero
functions.description: Zero the specified array (utility to set elements to 0).

functions.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Calculate the volumetric specific heat capacity (Cv, J/K/m3) of each soil node.

functions.name: doThermalConductivity
functions.description: Calculate the thermal conductivity of each soil node based on constituents and water content.

functions.name: interpolateTemperature
functions.description: Interpolate air temperature over the day (hourly/half-hourly) from daily Min/Max/Mean.

functions.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
functions.description: Calculate atmospheric boundary layer conductance (thermal conductance) based on wind, stability, canopy and radiation.

functions.name: doThomas
functions.description: Numerical solution of the heat-flow equations using the Thomas algorithm (tri-diagonal solver).

functions.name: doUpdate
functions.description: Determine min, max, and average soil temperature from the sub-daily iterations and update daily aggregates.

functions.name: interpolateNetRadiation
functions.description: Calculate net radiation (shortwave + longwave) at the soil surface for a timestep.
